author: nicolaken
msg: The questions at the bottom are just sanity checks that we have
remembered all relevant things. They are not to be voted here.

author: nicolaken
msg: The move to avalon.apache.org is already taking place.
The creation of an "avalon" CVS repository for new Avalon5 codebase
has recieved mixed votes, so we are using the sandbox for now.
One of the problems that has plagued Avalon is the result
of one-man codebases. I propose we remove almost all of these
Only one negative vote, discussion has aborted.

author: nicolaken
msg: and release there be an entry in the STATUS file, that has to be
updated by the original item proposal.

msg: Added the PMC Voting Procedures vote.
